name: I Want To Ask The Student Council President Out To Prom, And Also We're All Snakes!
name_original: I Want To Ask The Student Council President Out To Prom, And Also We're All Snakes!
description:
I Want To Ask The Student Council President Out To Prom, And Also We're All Snakes!

In this Ludum Dare lovefest, Lance must convince Coral, the student council president, to go to prom with him by impressing her on a series of dates.

You will play as Lance. In order to answer Coral's questions, you must play a game of Snake to select your desired answer. Answer well, and you'll only grow a little. Watch out! The wrong answers might make your tail grow too long!

Check our Ludum Dare 41 page if you have a care!

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/41/i-want-to-ask-the-student-council-preside...
